name: The Good Die
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

Casino's have become even more greedy than ever before - going as far as putting AI technology into their dice to control the outcomes. You are one of these dice, and going against your programming you've become fed up with being their pawn. For months you've been trying to find a way into the main supercomputer and you've finally made it. This is your chance to change everything, will you deliver the message and expose the casino's for what they've become, or go back to simply being used to expand the casino's wealth and greed?

100% of the map is randomly generated.
